name: Nullicorn
description: The Nullicorn is a large, unsettling creature that combines formidable power with a chaotic nature, sporting a blend of physical and magical attributes.
memorable: It possesses unique magical resistance abilities such as Magic Evasion and Limited Magic Immunity that profoundly impact combat dynamics.
goals: The Nullicorn seeks to dominate its environment and devastate those who oppose it using both brute strength and crippling magic effects.
relations: Typically encountered alone but may be found in the company of other aberrations or twisted creatures serving chaotic beings.
environment: Often dwells in dark and chaotic areas prone to magical disturbances.
strengths: High Strength and Wisdom enhance its melee prowess and perceptual awareness.
weaknesses: Moderate Dexterity and Intelligence may hinder it in agility or intelligence-based challenges.
attacks: It can strike with powerful Hooves attacks, deal force damage with its Void Horn, and unleash necrotic damage with Ripple of Darkness.
most_powerful_ability: Nullifying Blight, a debilitating disease that affects creatures using magic near the Nullicorn.
senses: It has blindsight up to 120 feet, allowing it to sense the magical and physical world around it without relying on sight.
skills: Skilled in Perception with a +3 bonus, making it adept at noticing hidden threats.
additional_information: Immunities to necrotic and poison damage.
Resistance to being charmed, paralyzed, or poisoned.
Magic Resistance provides advantage on saving throws against magical effects.
Ability to sense magic within a 120 ft radius.
test_queries: large chaos creature with magic resistance
aberration that spreads disease through magic
creature that senses magic and has high strength
